English: Informs all party members of the party leader's location.
The party leader orders party members to attack a target.
The party leader orders all party members to retreat.
Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.
Each party member around the leader increases the party leader's damage by 5%.
Increases the chance for Masquerpets to drop unique items.
Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist, party members recover 1.8 times faster.
Increases the number of items dropped by Masquerpets.
Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
